reg_pit.title: B.C. Egg Marketing Board Powers and Duties Regulation No. 2

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 92/2004, effective March 12, 2004.

reg.title: B.C. Egg Marketing Board Powers and Duties Regulation No. 2

section.sectiontext: The British Columbia Egg Marketing Board, established by B.C. Reg. 173/67, is vested with the powers described in section 11 (1) (o), (r), (s), (t) and (u) of the Natural Products Marketing (BC) Act.

content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Natural Products Marketing (BC) Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 330, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: sections 5 and 22]
